updates.description: SharePoint Syntex uses advanced AI and machine teaching to amplify human expertise, automate content processing, and transform content into knowledge. It delivers AI benefits to you with the customization and flexibility to model AI based on your organization’s expertise.
updates.automation_value: Reduces manual work by automatically processing content and transforming it into knowledge.
updates.business_impact: Saves significant time for businesses that deal with large volumes of content, improving efficiency and productivity.

updates.description: Home Sites is a dynamic, engaging, and personalized employee experience for your organization. It's a landing page designed for everyone in your company, filled with news, relevant content, and important sites.
updates.automation_value: Automates the process of curating relevant content for employees.
updates.business_impact: Saves time and ensures that everyone has access to the information they need, enhancing communication and collaboration within the organization.

updates.description: SharePoint Spaces is a web-based, immersive platform, which lets you create and share, secure and extensible mixed reality experiences. Add a new dimension to your intranet by using 2D and 3D web parts to create your mixed reality vision.
updates.automation_value: Provides a new way to interact with data, potentially saving time by making information more accessible and engaging.
updates.business_impact: Enhances data visualization and interaction, potentially improving decision-making and collaboration.

updates.description: SharePoint Lists enable you to create, share, and track items with your team. New features include rules-based formatting and the ability to create custom forms with Power Apps.
updates.automation_value: The rules-based formatting and custom forms can automate data entry and tracking.
updates.business_impact: Reduces manual work and saves time, improving data management and team collaboration.

updates.description: The SharePoint Framework (SPFx) is a page and web part model that provides full support for client-side SharePoint development, easy integration with SharePoint data, and support for open source tooling. Version 1.12 includes new features and improvements for better performance and expanded capabilities.
updates.automation_value: Provides tools for developers to automate tasks and integrate with SharePoint data.
updates.business_impact: Saves significant time in development and data management, improving efficiency and productivity.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: SharePoint Syntex
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: SharePoint Syntex uses advanced AI and machine teaching to amplify human expertise, automate content processing, and transform content into knowledge. It delivers AI benefits to you with the customization and flexibility to model AI based on your organization’s expertise.
   Automation Value: It reduces manual work by automatically processing content and transforming it into knowledge. This can save significant time for businesses that deal with large volumes of content.

2. Update Name: SharePoint Home Sites
   Release Date: January 2024
   Description: Home Sites, a dynamic, engaging, and personalized employee experience for your organization. It's a landing page designed for everyone in your company, filled with news, relevant content, and important sites.
   Automation Value: It automates the process of curating relevant content for employees, saving time and ensuring that everyone has access to the information they need.

3. Update Name: SharePoint Spaces
   Release Date: June 2024
   Description: SharePoint Spaces is a web-based, immersive platform, which lets you create and share, secure and extensible mixed reality experiences. Add a new dimension to your intranet by using 2D and 3D web parts to create your mixed reality vision.
   Automation Value: It provides a new way to interact with data, potentially saving time by making information more accessible and engaging.

4. Update Name: SharePoint Lists
   Release Date: September 2024
   Description: SharePoint Lists enable you to create, share, and track items with your team. New features include rules-based formatting and the ability to create custom forms with Power Apps.
   Automation Value: The rules-based formatting and custom forms can automate data entry and tracking, reducing manual work and saving time.

5. Update Name: SharePoint Framework (SPFx) v1.12
   Release Date: March 2025
   Description: The SharePoint Framework (SPFx) is a page and web part model that provides full support for client-side SharePoint development, easy integration with SharePoint data, and support for open source tooling. Version 1.12 includes new features and improvements for better performance and expanded capabilities.
   Automation Value: The SPFx provides tools for developers to automate tasks and integrate with SharePoint data, potentially saving significant time in development and data management.
